query:
SELECT
            u.id as "id!",
            u.username,
            u.is_admin as "is_admin: bool",
            u.created_at as "created_at!",
            COUNT(s.id) as "scrobble_count!"
        FROM users u
        LEFT JOIN scrobs s ON u.id = s.user_id
        GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.is_admin, u.created_at
        ORDER BY u.created_at DESC
